title: Oiso, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar UL edge; ULQ, near center
description: large group off semi-nude men shoulder a palanquin across a river while other swimmers carry other travelers; a group of travelers waits on the shore for their party to arrive; colorful mountains in the background, beyond a grassy plain
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
